definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to give it your all/to go at it with all you've got/to throw your whole weight behind it/also pr. [hun2 shen1 jie3 shu4]

sentences.english: The pangolin whole body's lamella is its thorn, is similar with the nail.
sentences.chinese: 穿山甲浑身的鳞片就是它的刺，与指甲相类似。

sentences.english: A man boarded the bus and his body was full of perspiration.
sentences.chinese: 一个浑身是汗的男人上车了。

sentences.english: My beard and clothes are crusted with sand, my body is sore and aching.
sentences.chinese: 我的胡须和衣服上都是沙子，我的浑身酸痛。

sentences.english: And in spite of its being winter I would perspire all over.
sentences.chinese: 尽管这时还是冬天，我却浑身都被汗湿透。

sentences.english: Her whole body quavered when she heard the sad news.
sentences.chinese: 她听到那悲惨的消息后浑身颤抖。

sentences.english: He created little boys, full of spirit and fun.
sentences.chinese: 祂创造了小男孩，让他浑身是劲和兴味。

sentences.english: She was underdressed for the hiking trip and suffered hypothermia.
sentences.chinese: 她徒步旅行时穿得有些薄弱，因此以为浑身发冷。

sentences.english: One of cars was completely deformed. Its driver was covered with blood all over.
sentences.chinese: 其中一辆完全变了形，那辆车的司机浑身是血。

sentences.english: Only in winter, and people get myself full force.
sentences.chinese: 只有冬天，才让人浑身充满力量。

sentences.english: Doctor, I am not comfortable every where, that is, I do not know Shabing.
sentences.chinese: 大夫，我浑身哪儿都不舒服，就是不知啥病。

sentences.english: She walked on stage again, shaking from head to foot, and started speaking.
sentences.chinese: 她再次走上台，浑身上下抖个不停，开始说台词。

sentences.english: They were commingling lice and blood．
sentences.chinese: 他们浑身是血混合着虱子。

sentences.english: Suddenly all the tension seemed to leave my body as the truth of what he said hit me.
sentences.chinese: 找领悟了他话中的道理，浑身的紧张顿时消失了。

sentences.english: Oily skin after bathing, every mind and the body fluent in its landscaping.
sentences.chinese: 洗浴后皮肤油腻，浑身舒畅，气血通顺，心旷神怡。

sentences.english: But this he declined , as he was dirty and wet.
sentences.chinese: 不过，这被他谢绝了，因为他浑身又脏又湿。

definition: to tremble/to shiver/uncontrolled shaking of the body
back (of a human or other vertebrate)
calf (back of the leg below the knee)
the back of the human body
